participant_1.background:
I don't care what color my hair is as long as I can keep acting.
i am saving up to buy a new camera.
I've learned to live without my dad.
i play music in my spare time.
I never told my parents about my deployment, but I would tell my friends all about it if I was famous.

participant_2.background:
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.
I want to have more fun with my siblings.
I like the color green because it reminds me of fresh produce, which is a key ingredient in my cupcake business.
i m really short.
I think it's really cool to be able to build things with your own hands.

content.text: Doing well! Just got back from a walk with my dog. What did you do today?
I took a nap, then played some music. It is my day off, so I am just relaxing.
Sounds nice! I need to take a nap soon. I have a cupcake business and I am recovering from knee surgery.
Oh no! I hope your knee feels better soon!
Thanks! It is getting better every day. I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering.
I love dogs! I have a cat named Mittens. She is a bit of a diva, but I love her.
I have always wanted a cat, but I am allergic. I like to watch videos of cats on YouTube.
I love watching videos of cats too! What kind of cupcakes do you make?
I make a variety of cupcakes, but my most popular ones are the chocolate chip and red velvet.
Those sound delicious! I think I would like the chocolate chip ones.
They are my favorite too! I can send you a few if you want.
That would be great! I love free food!
